description.overview: Connections represents your romantic connection energy, openness to intimacy, and the flow of affection in relationships.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Venus and Mars transits to your natal Venus, Moon, and 7th house (partnerships). Venus governs romantic attraction, affection, and relationship harmony. Mars adds passion and desire but can create conflict. The Moon shows emotional availability. When these planets form supportive aspects, love flows naturally and you feel open to connection. Challenging aspects create relationship tension, defensiveness, or difficulty giving and receiving affection. Venus retrograde reduces romantic flow by 30%.

primary_planets.venus: Rules romantic love, affection, and relationship harmony
primary_planets.moon: Emotional availability and nurturing capacity in relationships

secondary_planets.mars: Passion and desire - adds heat but can create conflict
secondary_planets.jupiter: Expands love and generosity when supportive

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum romantic impact - intense connection or intensity
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between independence and togetherness
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - love comes easily and naturally
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - relationship challenges to work through

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Relational and heart-centered - talk about intimacy, vulnerability, partnership dynamics
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize expressing love, deepening intimacy, having vulnerable conversations, quality time
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Emphasize self-love, not forcing connection, honoring need for space
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge relationship tension but focus on communication and understanding, not blame

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Love flows beautifully today - your heart is open and connection comes naturally. This is your window for vulnerable talks or deepening intimacy.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: Romantic energy is complicated today with both closeness and friction - be patient with yourself and your partner as you navigate mixed feelings.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Connection feels harder today - honor your need for space rather than forcing affection you don't feel right now.
